mapper.select: select * from review where goods_id = 0 order by review_asc desc
mapper.update: update review set likes_count = #{likes_count} where review_id = #{review_id}
mapper.select: select * from likes where review_id = #{review_id} and likes_isLike = 1
mapper.insert: insert into review (goods_id, user_id, review_title, review_content, review_viewCount, review_star, review_isPrivate, review_asc, review_answer, review_date, review_img) values(#{goods_id},#{user_id},#{review_title},#{review_content},0, #{review_star},#{review_isPrivate},#{review_asc},0,now(), #{review_img})
